title: afk op neff afk
body: another seires lost because roit has done little to nothing about blancing afkers in game ... while games like counter stike have a better system for dealing with this

replies.body:
Read [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules).

Your input into wanting to get consistent afk known is valued, but this is not the right place to go about it. The in-game report system is usually sufficient enough, though in some cases where the player is especially illusive, then you might have to make a support ticket about it.
